high_descs: Move forward and face the toilet to your right.
Take the soap off the top of the toilet in front of you.
Move back and face the cabinet by the toilet in front of you.
Open the cabinet, place the soap inside and close the cabinet in front of you.
Face the toilet in front of you.
Take the soap off of the top of the toilet in front of you.
Move back and face the cabinet by the toilet in front of you.
Open the cabinet, place the soap inside and close the cabinet in front of you.
tasks.task_desc: Place soap in cabinet under the sink.

high_descs: Turn around and walk to the sink on the right
Open the left hand cabinet under the sink and pick up the bar of soap
Place the soap into the sink and turn on the water to rinse the soap, then turn off the water and pick up the soap
Take a step backwards and continue to face the sink on the right
Place the bar of soap on the counter to the left of the sink in front of the yellow spray bottle
tasks.task_desc: Place wet soap on a counter

high_descs: turn around and walk forwards to the bathroom sink at the end of the room
grab the soap from the cabinet below the sink
place the soap inside the sink and rinse it off, then take it back out
look up a bit and then turn to back up a bit to face the sink again
place the bar of soap down on the bathroom counter to the left of the right side sink
tasks.task_desc: place a clean bar of soap on the bathroom counter space

high_descs: Turn around and go to the cabinet underneath the right sink across from you.
Pull out the bar of soap from the cabinet.
Place the bar of soap in the right sink, turn the water on, rinse the bar of soap off, turn the water off, and remove the bar of soap from the sink.
Move over to the left so that you are in front of the counter top.
Place the bar of soap on the counter top, between the two sinks.
tasks.task_desc: Put a clean bar of soap on the counter top.

high_descs: Turn slightly to the left and go to the middle of the two sinks
Grab a bar of soap that's in between the sinks
Move slightly to the right
Wash the soap in the sink and then take it out
Back up from the counter
Put the soap on the counter to the left of the sink
tasks.task_desc: Putting clean soap down next to the sink

high_descs: Go forward and turn to face the counter between the two sinks.
Pick the bar of soap closest to the front edge of the counter up.
Go to the right and stand in front of the sink on the right.
Put the soap in the sink and turn the water on and then off and pick the soap up again.
Back up and face the counter in the middle of the sinks.
Put the soap down on the counter between the two sinks.
tasks.task_desc: Put a clean bar of soap on the counter.

high_descs: Turn left, step forward, then go right to the counter between the sinks.
Pick up the soap nearest to you on the counter.
Go to the sink to your right.
Wash the soap in the sink.
Turn around, move forward, then turn back around to face the sink.
Put the soap on the counter, to the left of the sink.
tasks.task_desc: Put clean soap on the counter.

high_descs: Go across room, turn right to face garbage and toilet, proceed to garbage and toilet.
Pick up left spray bottle from back of toilet.
Proceed to garbage can.
Place spray bottle in garbage can, left of toilet.
Look up to face back of toilet.
Pick up spray bottle from back of toilet.
Move left to be in front of garbage can.
Place spray bottle in garbage can with other spray bottle.
tasks.task_desc: Move spray bottles from back of toilet to garbage can.

high_descs: Turn around and cross the room, then make a right and walk to the toilet
Pick up the middle soap bottle that is sitting on the back of the toilet
Turn right and cross the room to the back wall, then make a left and face the sink that is on the right
Place the soap bottle on the counter to the left of the sink, above the bar of soap
tasks.task_desc: Place a bottle of soap on a counter

high_descs: Turn around and walk to the opposite wall then turn right and walk to the green bin.
Take the middle soap dispenser from the toilet.
Turn right and walk to the wall, then turn left and walk to the sink.
Put the dispenser on the counter between the two sinks, behind the soap.
tasks.task_desc: Put a soap dispenser on the counter.

high_descs: Turn around and walk to toilet to your right.
Grab the lotion between the other bottles of lotion on the toilet.
Look down, turn around, turn left and walk to the sink to the far left.
Place the bottle of lotion on the counter between the sinks.
tasks.task_desc: Place a bottle of lotion on the counter between the sinks.

high_descs: Go to your left and face the toilet.
Pick up the soap dispenser from the right side of the toilet tank lid.
Face right and go to the sink on the right.
Put the soap dispenser next to the right sink on the counter between the two sinks, just behind the candle.
tasks.task_desc: Place a soap dispenser next to a bathroom sink.

high_descs: go to the toilet
pick up the pump bottle from the toilet
take the bottle to the middle of the sinks
put the bottle on the counter between the sinks
tasks.task_desc: take the pump bottle from the toilet to the counter between the sinks

high_descs: Move to the toilet on the left.
Pick up the pump bottle on the toilet tank.
Move to the sink on the far right.
Place the bottle on the counter to the left of the sink.
tasks.task_desc: Move the bottle to the sink.

high_descs: Turn right, hang a right at the wall, and turn left at the toilet to face the toilet paper holder on the wall.
Pick up the brown cardboard roll to the left of the green container on the floor.
Turn left, hang a left at the wall and face the toilet to the left.
Place the cardboard roll inside of the lower left cabinet and close the door.
Turn right and walk closer to the toilet to reach the toilet tank.
Pick up the roll of toilet paper to the right of the soap bottle on the toilet tank.
Turn around, walk forward towards the shower and turn around again to face the toilet.
Place the roll of toilet paper inside the lower left cabinet behind the cardboard roll and close the door.
tasks.task_desc: Place a cardboard roll and a toilet paper roll in a cabinet.

high_descs: Turn right, go towards the all, turn right, go towards the green bin, turn left and face the wall.
Take the cardboard roll on the floor to the left of the green bin.
Go in front of the toilet and face it.
Put the cardboard roll in the bottom left cabinet under the sink.
Go forward towards the space between the toilet and the sink.
Take the toilet paper from the top of the toilet tank.
Go in front of the toilet and face it.
Put the toilet paper in the bottom left cabinet under the sink.
tasks.task_desc: Put toilet paper rolls in a cabinet.

high_descs: Turn left and walk to the toilet paper holder to the left of the toilet.
Pick up the toilet paper from the toilet paper holder.
Turn around and walk to the cabinet below the sink.
Place the toilet paper in the leftmost cabinet under the sink.
Walk to the tube on top of the toilet.
Pick up the tube on top of the toilet.
Walk to the cabinets below the sink.
Place the tube in the leftmost cabinet under the sink.
tasks.task_desc: Place a tube and a roll of toilet paper in the leftmost cabinet under the sink.

high_descs: Turn to the right and go across the room, then face the sink on the left.
Pick up the towel from the holder on the right side wall.
Carry the towel and take a few steps to the left.
Place the towel on the back of the toilet.
tasks.task_desc: Move a towel to the toilet.

high_descs: Turn to your right and go to the white sink beside the wall.
Pull down the white towel, hanging from the towel holder on the wall, to the right of the sink.
Turn to your left and go to the small area between the toilet and the sink.
Place the towel on the back of the toilet, to the right of all the nail polish.

high_descs: Turn right and cross the room to the wall, then turn left and face the sink.
Pick up the white towel that is hanging up on the wall to the right of the sink
Turn left and cross the room, turn right at the end of the sink vanity so that you are facing the sink and the toilet
Place the towel on the back of the toilet
tasks.task_desc: Place a towel on the back of a toilet

high_descs: Go straight, towards the wall, then turn left and walk to the sink by the wall.
Pull down the towel that is hanging from the towel holder, on your right.
Turn to your left and do to the toilet on your right.
Put the towel on the back of the toilet tank, to the right of the yellow spray bottle.

Pick up the white hand towel on the towel ring
Carry the hand towel to the right side of the toilet tank
Place the hand towel on the right side of the toilet tank

remove the towel from the holder
turn left an walk to the toilet
place the towel on the back of the toilet

high_descs: Go forward and stand at the sink on the right.
Take the white towel down from the towel ring.
Go left and then turn right to face the toilet.
Put a towel on the back of the toilet.
tasks.task_desc: Put a towel on a toilet.

high_descs: Go forward to the sink on the right
Take the towel from the ring on the right wall
Turn left and go to the toilet on the right
Place the towel on the right side of the toilet tank
tasks.task_desc: Move the towel to the toilet tank

Pick up the wash cloth off of the metal ring on the wall to your right.
Turn left and walk over to the toilet, then turn right.
Put the wash cloth on top of the toilet tank on the right side.

high_descs: Turn to your right and approach the sink.
Grab a bar of soap from under the sink.
Place the soap in the sink and turn the faucet on and off before removing the soap.
Take a step backward.
Place the wet soap under the sink.

high_descs: Go to the right to stand in front of the sink on the left.
Open the cabinet below the sink and on the right and take out the bar of soap.
Put the soap in the sink and turn the water on and then off and pick the soap back up.
Go left and stand to the left of the cabinet below the sink.
Open the cabinet on the left, below the sink, and put the soap in and then shut the door.

high_descs: walk over to the sink
get the bar of soap from under the sink
put the soap in the sink and take it back out
take the bar of soap to the toilet
put the soap bar in the cabinet under the sink
tasks.task_desc: rinse the soap and put it under the sink

high_descs: Turn left and go to the toilet
Pick up the soap on the toilet tank
Turn around and go to the sink by the wall
Put the soap in the sink, fill the sink with water and then drain the sink and pick up the soap
Turn right and turn a full circle until facing counter again
Open the cabinet door under the sink, put the soap in the cabinet and close the door.
tasks.task_desc: Move the soap from the toilet to under the sink.

high_descs: Turn left, walk up to the shower, hang a right, and walk up to the toilet.
Pick up the bar of soap that is on the back of the toilet.
Turn and head over to the bathroom sink.
Rinse the bar of soap off in the sink before taking it back out.
Turn all the way around until you are facing the bathroom sink again.
Open the left cabinet under the right bathroom sink and place the bar of soap inside.

high_descs: Turn left, move to the toilet next to the sink.
Pick up the soap on the toilet.
Turn around, bring the soap to the counter on the left, to the right sink.
Wet the soap in the right sink with water.
Bring the wet soap to the left cabinet under the right sink.
Put the wet soap in that cabinet.

high_descs: Turn right and walk towards the sink. Face the sink
Open the left cabinet below the sink. Pick up the soap inside the cabinet
Place the soap in the sink, turn on the faucet to fill the sink with water, turn off the faucet, and pick up the soap again
Step back while facing the sink
Place the soap back in the cabinet where you found it and close the door

open the left cabinet under the sink, take the pink bar out of the cabinet
put the pink bar in the sink, wash it with water, take it out
turn around, turn around,
put the pink bar back in the cabinet underneath

Pick up the wet soap in the sink.
Put the wet soap back in the left cabinet under the right sink.

place the soap dispenser on top of the toilet

walk over to the the toilet again
put the soap dispenser on top of the toilet

Place the liquid soap container on top of the toilet tank.

Turn around and then turn back to your right and go right towards the toilet.
Put the soap holder on back of the toilet.
Turn back to your right, go forward and then left to face the sink.
Pick up another soap holder.
Turn left and go back towards the toilet
Put the soap holder on the back of the toilet as well.

high_descs: Turn around, go across the room to the sink on the right.
Open the left cupboard underneath the sink, take the bottle from the cupboard.
Go to the toilet to the left of the sinks.
Put the bottle on the right of the toilet's tank.
Go back to the sink on the right near the wall.

Go to the toilet to the left of the sinks.
Put the bottle on the toilet's tank to the left of the other bottle.

grab the soap dispenser out of the bottom cabinet
walk over to the toilet

put the soap dispenser on top of the toilet next to the other one

Turn around, go forward, turn right, go forward, turn right to face the toilet.
Put the bottle in the green bin to the left of the toilet.

With the spray bottle in hand, move to face the trash can on the left of the toilet.
Throw the spray bottle away in the trash can.

Stand the wet bar of soap on its end on the back of the toilet.

grab the bar of soap off of the top of the toilet to the left of the left candle

return back to the toilet to your left
place the soap back on top of the toilet but to the right this time

Pick the soap up from the back of the toilet.
Turn around and approach the sink?
Put the soap in the sink, turn on the water, turn off the water and take the soap out of the sink.
Move to the left and stand facing the right side of the toilet.
Put the soap on the back of the toilet.

Head to the right and face the sink on the left.

Put the soap on the toilet.

Move to the left to face the sink on the left.
Put the soap in the sink and turn the water on and then off and pick the soap back up.

Move to the sink that is to the right of the toilet.
Rinse off the bar of soap in the sink before pulling it back out.

Turn left.

Put the empty toilet paper roll on the toilet paper holder.

Find the cabinet to the right of the toilet.
Open the lower cabinet door and place the candle in it.

high_descs: Move towards the picture frame on the wall and then turn right and move to the green rubbish bin.

Turn around, move towards the shower stall, then turn left and move in front of the toilet.
Open the bathroom vanity cabinet door to the right of the toilet brush and plunger and place the candle in the vanity cabinet. Close the cabinet door.

Turn around and around

Put the candle in the left cabinet under the sink on the right.

Place the soap in to the sink, turn the water on, turn the water off, and pick up the soap.
